column2: Following our glorious victory in the West, The Hungarians have sent out diplomats to negotiate their surrender
We shall not take any land, We are satisfied with the status-quo
Push our borders further up the Danube
Push our borders further up the Danube and establish a Transylvanian buffer-state
$MONARCHTITLE$, The Kingdoms of Wallachia and Moldavia have offered to become our subjects in return for our intervention in their war of independence
We have more important matters to attain to
We will free our christian brethern
$MONARCHTITLE$, The Kingdom of Hungary threatens to intevene on the side of the Kingdoms of Wallachia and Moldavia if we do not back down immediately
We cannot afford a war with the Hungarians
They can have their war, if they dare!
The Ottomans have sent out their demands following our surrender,We have no choice but to comply...
The Ottomans have sent out their demands following our surrender,We have no choice but to comply...
Following our glorious victory in the West, The Ottomans have sent out diplomats to negotiate their surrender
We are satisfied with the status-quo
Move our borders further down the balkans
The Nation weeps for the Hungarian Hordes have compelled the great Ottomans to kneel, We have no choice but to comply with the Hungarian demands...
The Nation weeps for the Hungarian Hordes have compelled the great Ottomans to kneel, We have no choice but to comply with the Hungarian demands...
Nationalist Rebels have stormed Bucharest and have taken over our vassals' lands, we must put them down
